Package GUI

Class MusicChoices

java.lang.Object
GUI.MusicChoices
All Implemented Interfaces:
MusicSubject
public class MusicChoices
extends java.lang.Object
implements MusicSubject
MusicChoices class is a ConcreteSubject that has all interactive JavaFX components for creating requests.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MusicChoices()
    Construct the components with their relevant information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void attach​(MusicObserver observer)
    Method that attaches the observers to this subject
    void detach​(MusicObserver observer)
    Method that detaches the observers from this subject
    javafx.scene.control.ComboBox getChoices()
    Returns a JavaFX ComboBox component of all possible request choices
    javafx.scene.control.Button getHelp()
    Returns a JavaFX Button component that triggers the help command
    javafx.scene.control.Button getRedo()
    Returns a JavaFX Button component that triggers the redo command
    javafx.scene.control.Button getUndo()
    Returns a JavaFX Button component that triggers the undo command

    Method that notifies all observers of any changes made

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers​(java.lang.String s) throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Method that notifies all observers of any changes made
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface MusicSubject
      Parameters:
      s - String of request command to be replaced / parsed
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Represents an exception where the Execution of a command fails.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown when a thread is sleeping waiting.
